    • createDatabaseServer

      protected SqlDatabaseServer createDatabaseServer(String path) throws Exception
      Description copied from class: SqlDatabase
      Creates the SqlDatabaseServer to be used when opening a database.

      Extending classes can use this method to create a custom SqlDatabaseServer implementation.

      Overrides:
      createDatabaseServer in class SqlDatabase
      Parameters:
      path - the location of the database server
      Returns:
      a SqlDatabaseServer to be used by this database
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurred while creating the SqlDatabaseServer.
      See Also:
      • SqlDatabase.open(String)

    • close

      public void close(boolean compact, boolean cleanup)
      Description copied from class: AbstractDatabase
      Closes the database. If the parameter compact is true, the database will be compacted, compacting the database ensures a minimal space disk usage but it will also take longer to close. If the parameter cleanup is true any necessary cleanups are performed prior to closing the database (the cleanup removes the temporary HistoryReferences.)

      Also, removes the database listeners added previously.

      Specified by:
      close in interface Database
      Overrides:
      close in class SqlDatabase
      Parameters:
      compact - true if the database should be compacted, false otherwise.
      cleanup - true if any necessary cleanups should be performed, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • HistoryReference

    • isFileBased

      public boolean isFileBased()
      Overrides:
      isFileBased in class SqlDatabase
